dmca.title: Violation of the Athena trademark
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs

We have found that you have registered the domain Athenainternet.com and is using it for business as our company Athena IT-Group A/S and Athena Internet A/S has done since 1995.

As we also hold the name Athena-internet.com you must have been aware, that you are in violation with a registered trademark when you registered the domain.

The name Athena is registered as a trademark within the field of IT in general, you are therefore in violation with international law using the name.

Unless you change the name and close the website, we will be forced to take legal actions to protect our trademark. You will be given 7 days as from today before we will hand over the case to our lawyers.

Med Venlig Hilsen / Best Regards
Peter Kroul - Athena Internet A/S
CEO
